Projects.Title: Timetable Generator Using Genetic Algorithms
Projects.Objective: To automate the timetable generation process at Galgotias University.
Projects.Description: This Timetable generator is a full-fleshed Web-App powered by the Genetic Algorithm, can be used to schedule classes for the whole university. This timetable generator is not only limited to Galgotias University, and can be easily configured for other schools and colleges.

Projects.Title: Mess Management System
Projects.Objective: To develop an online platform for hostel students.
Projects.Description: This Mess Management System allows the student to Rate Food, Give Feedback, Choose and View menu, and allows admin the view the feedback and help them generate better a Timetable.
